data.text: Jisu'n Gennesaret tuidiil pangnga aleingirra aleiom phakhan mipui'n Pathian chong karangaisik ama kooltiang innengtirra inheiwa. Matt 13:1,2; Mk 3:9,10
Halli ama'n tuipangnga rakuong inni aleimu, takkha ngakasur ngaichu rakuong makheiya insuok ah leen inrasuwa inleiom.
Jisu'n rakuong inkhat ah aleiluut, khawakha Simon ta alei eii, halli ama'n aleitipi tuilaitiang lektei heinamru. Halli Jisu'n rakuongnga in-ongnga mipuidiang kaminchu aleiphut.
Ama'n arilsuoa, Simon diang aleiti, “Rakuong kha tui inthuup natiang namluutro, halli naleen kha nga surnasik worro.”
Simon'n aleimasang “Karu,” “Keini'n Zaansoot leen kinworra iteii kinsurmak ejei. Takkha nang iti dungjungya kei'n leenhi wortakte.” Jn 21:3
Inmani'n leen ngaikha inwor phakhan nga katamtak lei-inkhit ah leen ngaikha leichetsik leithojei. Jn 21:3
Halli inmani'n rakuong khat ah kaom insap ngaikha inkut inzaap ah nasannasik inleikoi. Inmani'n inheiwa ah rakuong innikha nga inleiminsip wiak ah inmani rakuong kha tuiya luutsik aleitho.
Simon Peter in kasuok rakip amu phakhan, Jisu kekuungnga inbok ah aleiti, “Ka Pumi” kei kadiang makheiya sitaro, ajarchu keihi manu karoon mi ka eii.
Simon khat-um amale kaleiom mi rakip in inmani'n nga katamtak inleisur jarra ngakna inleinei,
Khawa khanna kaleiom kha Simon le inlop Zebedee sapa Jame li John in eii, halli Jisu'n Simon diang aleiti, “Chimaro; atuun makheiya inphut nanghi mikasur na-esikjei.”
Inmani rakuong kha muongtiang inleinuksuok, angrakip inmathaanna halli Jisu kha inleijui.

Jisu'n khuopui inkhat ah aleiom phakhan, pasal inkhat takbang ri karoon inkhat aheiwa, ama'n Jisu aleimu phakhan, inbok ah Jisu diang aleini, “Pumi, nang nalungdou e-inchu keihi namindam mator nate!”
Jisu'n akut duongnga ama kha aleikatook, “Kei'n kazoot,” “Damtaro!” khawapha takkhan takbang ri'n amathaanjei.

Jisu'n amadiang chongpena aleinei, “Tudiang tipimaro, takkha nang in si inlang thiampu ngaidiang juoinmuro; khale inruoiya nang mindamna jarra Moses chongpeii dungjuiya mipui diang sakhi enasik doiphur juoinchangro.”Levi 14:1-32
Takkha Jisu jarra chongkha kheella rilthiangna inlainei, halli mipui'n amadiang chong karangaisik khat-um kana ngaikha indamnasik amadiang inheiwa.
Takkha Jisu'n mi lengmakna mun ngaikhan aleisiya Pathian aleini.

Nisuo khatni Jisu'n aleiminchu phakhan, Galilee, Judea khat-um Jerusalem khuopui makheiya kaheiwa Pharisee li juina Dan karu ngai'n akoolla inlei in-ong, halli Pumi ranak mindam matornakha Jisu diang aleiom.
Pasal lekkhat in apangkathi miring inkhat azaalnale inruoiya inheichoi, halli inmani'n mindamnasik beiya insuungtiang keiluutnasik khat-um Jisu koolla danasik ah inleitho.
Mipui katamtak in ajar eya leiluutpui matormu, inmani'n innchungnga inkaalla innchung inminwengnga ama zaalna khale inruoiya mipui karra Jisu maikuungnga injuomachum.
Jisu'n inmani ngamna aleimupha khan ama'n ati, “Suopui, Nang namanu ngaikha kanangai dampijei.”
Dan karu ngaili Pharisee ngai'n inmalung suungnga inngaidonna inleiti, “Pathian karilsehi tume? Pathian eleiya, tu innum manu ngaidam matormu!”
Jisu'n inmani i-ngaidonkha aleijet phakhan inmani diang aleitipi, “Angjarra hiwa ngaihi ning malungnga ning ngaidonme?
‘Nang namanu ngaikha kana ngaidamjei,’ emakli ‘Inthei inlang sitaro’ tihi hume kabei?
Nangni'n jetningte miring Sapa in manmasituolla manu ngaidamnasik ranak anei” Ama'n apang kathipa diang ati, “Kei'n nang nadiang kanati, inthei inlang nazaalna choi inlang na inntiang kirtaro.”
Khawa phakhan pasalpa khan inmani maikuungnga intheiya ama azaalna kha achoiya inntiang Pathian minpaak ah aleikirjei.
Inmani rakip in ngakna inleineiya Pathian inleiminpaak, halli kachi khan leisip ah inti, “Awini eini'n angtuk inlak chuonme nimujei!”
Hiwahi ahekli Jisu'n aleisuok ah rampar kakhom araming Levi kha ama chuon thona inna in-ongnga ileiomkha aleimu, Jisu'n amadiang atipi, “Kei najuiro.”
Angrakip ama'n amathaanna khat-um intheiya Jisu nuk ajuijei.
Halli Levi'n a-inna bubakna kalok inkhat Jisu sik-ah aleiminsuuk, khawakha rampar kakhoom khat-um aleiilaak mi katamtak inmani khale inlei-inong.
Pharisee li Dan karu lekkhat in asiamruoi ngaidiang inleitipi. “Ang jarrame nangni'n rampar kakhoom li manu karoon ngaile bak-in suomna ningnei?” Luk 15:1,2
Jisu'n inmani diang leimasang, “Kanamak ngaidiang kathiam arei ommak, takkha kana ngaisik achu areiom.
Kei'n Pathian kajetngai kakoi kijuo emak, takkha manukaroon ngai malung minthuulnasik kijuo eii.”
Inmani'n Jisu diang inleiti, “Ang jarrame John siamruoi ngai'n apha rakip bu ingeiya Pathian inni, halli Pharisee siamruoi ngai um khawa angnga inleitho; takkha nang nasiamruoi ngaichu inbak in-in.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Moipa kha inmanile omsuom laikhan moikaruoi kajuo mi ngaikha bu minngei niyabe?
Takkha moipa kha inmani diangnga inphut laruoidel nasik nikhuo kha alajuosik eii, khawapha khan inmani'n bu inngeisik eii.”
Jisu'n hiwa chong minkhina aleitipi: “Tuteii in puonkathar lek inkhat puonmaruo ah kathuidelmu, khawakha natho inchu akathar lek kha kamaruo le inhoinuni.
Tuteii in theibomju kathar kha jutuong maruo khan damu, khawakha ningtho inchu theibomju kathar in jutuong maruo kha minkoita aminmangsik eii.
Takkha theibomju kathar khachu akatha jutuongnga nidasik eii!
halli inkhat innum theibomju maruo innli thabomju kathar kha inzootnunu, ajarchu ama'n ati, theibomju maruo hi athadoom.”
